summary: TAKATA RECALL.  I RECEIVED SAFETY RECALL NOTICE 16S26/NHTSA RECALL 16V-384 IN JULY 2016.  I HEARD NOTHING FROM FORD AND WROTE TO FORD ON 9/19/2016.  FORD REPLIED WITH A FORM LETTER ON 9/29/2016 AND ASSIGNED CASE # CAS-10670226-D7R4V2.  THEY DID NOTHING ABOUT THE AIRBAG.  I WROTE TO MY LOCAL DEALER ON 2/28/17 AND RECEIVED A TELEPHONE REPLY A WEEK OR SO LATER, SINCE THEN NOTHING.  IT HAS NOW BEEN ALMOST A YEAR AND FORD HAS DONE NOTHING ABOUT WHAT IS DESCRIBED BY NATSA AS POSSIBLY CAUSING "SERIOUS INJURY OR DEATH."  I AM AFRAID EVERY TIME I DRIVE THIS VEHICLE AND I WILL NOT LET MY GRANDCHILDREN IN IT.  I WANT THE VEHICLE REPAIRED OR REPLACED.
